K

KafkaCollector - Class in zipkin2.collector.kafka08
This collector polls a Kafka topic for messages that contain TBinaryProtocol big-endian encoded lists of spans.
KafkaCollector.Builder - Class in zipkin2.collector.kafka08
Configuration including defaults needed to consume spans from a Kafka topic.

M

O

overrides(Map<String, ?>) - Method in class zipkin2.collector.kafka08.KafkaCollector.Builder
By default, a consumer will be built from properties derived from builder defaults, as well "auto.offset.reset" -> "smallest".
